pr_title: CATROID-743 Add Cancel option for new variable

timeline.message:

CATROID-743 Add Cancel option for new variable

CATROID-743 Add Cancel option for new variable

Add Cancel option for new variable option in formular editor (data).

timeline.bodyText: Please rename this function to something like "cancelAddVariableTest", so future developers know what this function does by it's name
timeline.author: juliajulie95

timeline.bodyText:
I feel like it would make much more sense to only call "performCancel" and then check if the variable does not exist.
You do not check if the cancellation worked right now, you only check if adding worked. If pressing cancel would add the variable anyway this test still wouldn't fail.
timeline.author: juliajulie95
